title: Stimulating Imagination: Towards General-purpose Object Rearrangement
abstract: arXiv:2408.01655v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: General-purpose object placement is a fundamental capability of an intelligent generalist robot, i.e., being capable of rearranging objects following human instructions even in novel environments. To achieve this, we break the rearrangement down into three parts, including object localization, goal imagination and robot control, and propose a framework named SPORT. SPORT leverages pre-trained large vision models for broad semantic reasoning about objects, and learns a diffusion-based 3D pose estimator to ensure physically-realistic results. One is that we can fully leverage the powerful ability of open-set object localization and recognition since no specific fine-tuning is needed for robotic scenarios. tldr: 本文提出了一种名为SPORT的框架，用于解决智能机器人的一般对象重新排列能力，即使在新环境中也能按照人类的指示重新排列物体。框架包含对象定位、目标想象力以及机器人控制三部分。利用预训练的大型视觉模型进行广泛的语义推理，并通过一个基于扩散的方法来估计3D姿态，以确保实现物理上合理的重新排列效果。通过这种方式，可以完全利用开放式对象定位和识别能力，无需特定于机器人场景的微调，并且基于扩散的方法仅需在物体与参考物体的相对位置确定后进行想象。
